name: Web Point and Print File
summary: Learn about .WEBPNP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WEBPNP files are often distributed using the Web Point-and-Print Protocol ([MS-WPRN]), which defines a method for downloading print drivers when a user clicks on a webpage link (an HTTP request) or a client program requests a driver. The website locates the appropriate driver and then returns a WEBPNP file to the requester. Once downloaded, the file can be opened to install the printer drivers.
WEBPNP files may contain the following contents:
An .INF setup file for the installation
A .BIN file specifying parameters needed to access printer configuration data
A .DAT file that includes any other printer setup data
WEBPNP files are executed by the Windows program wpnpinst.exe which is located in the ~/​Windows/​System32 directory.

description: A WEBPNP file is a printer driver package file used by Microsoft Windows. It is saved in the .CAB format and contains an install package for a printer driver. WEBPNP files are used for distributing printer drivers provided from websites or client networks.
